failure.name: bakery_lint.tests.upstream.test_ttx_glyphnames_clean
failure.err_msg: Glyph ".null" does not comply conventions. A glyph name may be up to 31 characters in length, must be entirely comprised of characters from the following set: A-Z a-z 0-9 .(period) _(underscore). and must not start with a digit or period. The only exception is the special character ".notdef". "twocents", "a1", and "_" are valid glyph names. "2cents" and ".twocents" are not.
failure.methodDoc: GlyphName length < 30 and does contain allowed chars only
